channel.title: Making a Wizard's Mind Bomb
channel.description:
Since no one can leave age 11 without having done some sort of psychoactive, I'm going to teach the way to make a powerful alternative to sniffing markers: the wizard's mind bomb.
What you'll need: Two glasses or other suitable container for liquid One coffee filter A polar solvent. See notes. Fifteen grams of wormwood (powdered) Ten grams of morning glory seeds (powdered) or a few ounces of morning glory foliage (powdered). See notes. Five grams of calamus (powdered) or the equivalent in calamus oil Ten grams of scullcap (powdered) 300 milligrams of diphenhydramine (in crushed pill form; syrup may not be entirely miscible in water.) See notes, lest you find your brain exploding.
To make: Place the wormwood, morning glory seeds/plant material, calamus, scullcap, and diphenhydramine into the first glass. Add your polar solvent and stir for at least thirty minutes. Filter the mixture through your coffee filter into the second glass and remove all solids that slip through the filter. If you wish to make a solid out of the solution or if your solvent was poisonous (such as methanol and isopropyl alcohol), allow the solution to evaporate completely. Whether you made a solid or still have the liquid (if so, see notes), consume it and enjoy the effects of your brain being shot with a repeater rifle.
A few notes: On all psychoactive ingredients: you can find all but the diphenhydramine at http://shamanhut.com. Diphenhydramine can be found in Benadryl. Dimenhydrinate (Dramamine) is similar to diphenhydramine and you may use it, but it requires double the dose for the same effect. On polar solvents: keep in mind if you want to make an extract of the solution, you'll want the solvent to be volatile. Some volatile solvents are: ethanol (the alcohol your parents drink, dearie), methanol, isopropyl alcohol (rubbing alcohol). Water is not volatile, but good if you're drinking the mixture. On morning glories: you may want to do a rough extraction on the powdered seeds/plant material beforehand. See erowid.org's section on this. On diphenhydramine: it's a total deliriant. The best description of a diphenhydramine is to compare it to a dream. And no, you won't know the hallucinations are just the effects of drugs. You may forget you took anything in the first place. It's good stuff if used properly. Do not do when in a bad mood. Doing so is basically asking for a terrible trip. On drinking the solution: wormwood is fucking bitter. You can't drink it raw unless your tastebuds are all dead and gone. Add a generous amount of sugar and it'll become a very tasty drink.
I've done my part now to get kids on drugs. Thank you, my dearies. Do describe your experiences from it if you try it, because it's fucking weird. Here's a picture of the final product, and yes, I know it's huge. http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/282/pict0286hy9.jpg

item.title: Making a Wizard's Mind Bomb
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

T[quote=“kloplop321, post:6, topic:166428”]that’s almost as stupid as making meth[/quote]

This is stupid because one you didn’t mention any of the HAZARDS OF THESE DRUGS other than diphenhydramine being a delirient, we don’t need a bunch of teen age kids taking 300MG of diphenhydramine let alone mixing it with all these other chems, 300 MG of diphenhydramine will have you blasted let alone adding Morning glory which contains ergoliness similar to LSD, main active being LSA, but it also is VERY VASOCONTRICTING, WHICH IS DANGEROUS VERY DANGEROUS, Not to mention I believe mixing wormwood with an SSRI (which sadly a lot of people take nowadays) can be dangerous, you didn’t mention and safety data or links for where to check for other interactions of medications, if someone is on an MAOI for instance most if not all these chemicals will be kicked up and last longer among other potential negative side effects, this is a terrible idea but I know first hand how scary mixing chems can be, let alone how deadly.

Not to mention you don’t seem to realize when you say (x grams of such and such a plant) MOST IF NOT ALL PLANTS ARE HIGHLY VARIABLE in active content, not just from plant to plant but even in the same plant one leaf can contain way more active then another Morning glories being one of these types of plants, 10 grams is also variable on size, size doesn’t always effect activity of the plant species. An even better example of this is Datura Inoxia, another delerient drug which contains tropane alkaloids (which have legitimate medical uses) but can be deadly in 1-4 mg doses especially in overly sensitive people, 1 leaf/flower form one plant could kill you or have you tripping so hard you legit think you’re watching television, yet in reality you’re actually staring at you’re stove on fire burning down the house around you. DIPHENHYDRAMINE WILL DO THE SAME SHIT BY ITSELF LET ALONE MIXED WITH OTHER PSYCHOACTIVE DRUGS. Jesus Christ childrens stupidity amazes me, you want a real trip Research Dimethyltryptamine, at least this drug is tried tested and true over at least a few hundred years of use.

Read full topic
